amendment.description: Add, at the end of the bill, the following (and amend the table of contents accordingly): SEC. 11. LIMITATION ON EXPERT WITNESS TESTIMONY. ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 115-179 to limit who qualifies as an expert witness in medical malpractice negligence cases, based on professional qualifications as well as geographic relation to where the case in chief is being litigated.
